sequence:
The Melancholy of a Princess Chevalier

<size=45>Chapter 2 - Do Your Best, Le Triomphant!</size>

scripts.say: Port - Commander's Office
Commander, here is a list of the ships participating in today's joint exercise. Please have a look.
Really, have you already forgotten? According to the plan that we made a while back, we would conduct a joint exercise between Iris Libre and the Royal Navy as a part of our ongoing daily training.
As the commander of the fleet, everyone's counting on you to keep things together. Come on, please hurry and check the list.
After getting scolded by my secretary ship...
I made a few small modifications to the list.
You'd like to adjust the list? Let me see...
Huh? You'd like me to lead the vanguard fleet?
It's because you want everyone to see my combat performance?
Heh. If that's the case, then I readily accept!
Commander, I'll be glad to show you - and everyone else - just how powerful the Le Fantasque-class is!
Afternoon - Training Grounds
Make sure to match each others' pace! Don't charge forward on accident!
Stay calm and collected. This isn't a solo operation, so don't be afraid to ask for help!
... Good work. We've finished this area, so let's go support our allies in the next area!
Due to Le Triomphant's successes, Iris Libre's team started off with a strong score.
Heheh, thank you very much, Commander.
What'd I tell you? Are you impressed with how powerful the Le Fantasque-class is?
That said, we're still working on the basics.
If my sisters were here...
Le Triomphant seemed to be immersed in her memories again...
Ahem! Nevermind! In any case, let's all review the results of today's joint exercise...
Ahh, what an exemplary secretary ship.
